instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter.
Hammer all nails deep enough to apply putty.
Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch.
Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer: BOYSEN®® WoodPrime™ B‑180 Putty: BOYSEN®® Masonry Putty B‑7311 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Latex Other suggested topcoats are BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ and Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™.

calculator.title: Topcoat
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Latex Flat Latex
calculator.note: Other options for topcoat: BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ or Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™
